original: {{A}} barrels in hold. \n{{B}}% remaining in current barrel.
translation: 货舱中剩余{{A}}桶.\n这一桶中还剩{{B}}%.

original: You can't currently save, either because you aren't docked at a port, or you are in the middle of making a story choice. Do you want to return to the title screen without saving?
translation: 你目前不能保存，因为你没有停靠在车站中，或者你正在故事中做出选择。你想在不保存的情况下返回开始界面吗？

original: If you die, you can reload or continue with a new captain.
translation: 如果死亡，你可以选择加载存档，或创建新的车长继续游戏。

original: If you die, you can only continue with a new captain.
translation: 如果死亡，你只能创建新的车长。

original: Fuel and Supplies are consumed at the default rate.
translation: 燃料和补给以默认速度消耗。

original: Enemy projectiles move at the default speed.
translation: 敌人的射弹以默认速度移动。

original: Only a few player weapons arc towards targets.
translation: 修正玩家少数武器的弹道。

original: Many player weapons arc gently towards targets, making aiming easier.
translation: 略微修正玩家大多数武器的弹道，使得瞄准更加容易。

original: Fuel and Supplies last longer, making it a little easier to survive and prosper.
translation: 燃料和补给更加持久，让生存和赚钱更加容易。

original: Enemy projectiles are somewhat slower, making it easier to avoid them.
translation: 敌人的射弹速度变慢，使之更容易避开。

original: Many player weapons arc aggressively towards targets, making aiming easier.
translation: 大幅修正玩家大多数武器的弹道，使得瞄准更加容易。

original: Fuel and Supplies last much longer. If you're finding it hard to survive or earn money, this should help.
translation: 燃料和补给更加持久，如果你认为生存或赚钱很困难，这应该有所帮助。

original: Enemy projectiles are significantly slower, making it easier to avoid them.
translation: 敌人的射弹速度明显变慢，使之更容易避开。

original: Are you sure you want to save and\nreturn to the title screen?
translation: 确定要保存并\n返回开始界面吗？

original: Other Issue – Includes gameplay, performance, graphics, UI and controls.
translation: 其他问题—包括游戏流程，性能，图象，UI和控制。

original: Narrative Issue – Includes typos, story progression and journal inconsistencies.
translation: 叙事问题—包括错别字，故事进度和日志的不一致。

original: Feedback – Tell us your thoughts, good and bad!
translation: 反馈—无论批评还是鼓励，请将您的意见告诉我们!

original: Narrative Issue – Includes typos, story progression, journal inconsistencies.
translation: 叙事问题—包括错别字、故事进展、日志不一致。

original: Your Journal! This keeps track of your progress and any opportunities you're pursuing.
translation: 这是你的日志！你的任务进度，以及你正追寻的所有机遇都记录在此。

original: Your engine was damaged in its escape from the Blue Kingdom. The captain was injured. Can you see her back to New Winchester? Time is running out for Captain Whitlock.
translation: 逃离蓝色王国时，你所在的机车受损，车长负伤。你能将她活着送回新温彻斯特吗？惠特洛克车长已经奄奄一息。

original: Your Officers! Use this tab while in port to appoint them, or at any time to talk to or otherwise interact with them.
translation: 这是你的车务官！停靠车站时，使用此界面来任命车务官，也可以随时与他们交谈或互动。

original: Your Profile! This records all aspects of your captain's abilities, accomplishments, and reputation.
translation: 这是你的概览！有关你的车长技能、成就和声誉的全部信息都记录在此。

original: Your Hold! This shows your current cargo and any prospects you've accepted. You can also change your locomotive's equipment here while in port, and jettison your unwanted cargo (while in port or otherwise).
translation: 这是你的货舱！你目前载有的货物和所有已接受的机会都在此显示。停靠车站时，你可以在此更换机车的装备，也可以抛弃不需要的货物（不论是否在车站都可以抛弃货物）。
看向俄耳甫斯号的随车医生

original: He has just appeared at your shoulder. His face is solemn; his hat is in his hands. He lowers his eyes.
translation: 他出现在你身旁，神情凝重；帽子脱下，双目低垂。

original: You coast into the bustle, the din, the soot and the steam of Wolvesey Station. It is clogged with other engines: scrappy mining locomotives from Lustrum-way, weathered explorers gleaming with frost; sleek Company vessels with bright brass fittings.\r\n\r\nNo sooner have you pulled into the sidings than a Brusque Stationmaster bustles over. He requests to come aboard. "I must speak with your captain," he insists, brandishing a ledger. "The usual formalities."
translation: 你的机车滑入伍夫塞站的铁轨，陷入了喧嚣、噪响、煤尘与蒸汽的洪流。站内早已水泄不通：有从伍载镇来的东拼西凑的采矿机车，有满身冰霜、历尽风雪的探险机车，还有装饰着锃亮黄铜配件、线条流畅的迎风公司机车。\n\n你们刚把机车驶进侧线，一位粗鲁的站长便赶了过来，要求登车。他说，"我必须和你们的车长谈谈，"同时挥舞着手中的账本，口气坚决地补充道："例行公事。"

original: The crew exchange bleak, wordless looks. The Orphean itself feels suddenly more empty. The Stationmaster looks confused. You inform him that unfortunately, Captain Whitlock has just passed. "Ah," he says, neutrally. "Sorry to hear that. Very sad, very sad." He waits for what he considers an appropriate minute and a half before continuing. "Alas, even amidst tragedy the cogs of bureaucracy must turn. If Captain Whitlock is deceased, the Station Authority require their answers from the first officer." He dons a set of spectacles and locates his pen. "It will be relatively painless. Name, background, purpose of visit, et cetera. Shall we begin?"
translation: 列车员们相顾无言，目光凄然。俄耳甫斯号仿佛突然空落了下来。站长面露疑色。你告诉他：就在刚刚，惠特洛克车长，去世了。 “啊。”他平静地回应，“很遗憾，真是遗憾。悲哀至极，悲哀至极。”他默然站了一分半钟，似乎在默哀。随后他继续说道：“唉，即便悲剧发生，官僚系统也不会停摆。如果惠特洛克车长身故，车站管理局依然需要大副代为答复。” 他戴上眼镜，取出钢笔，说道：“流程不算复杂。只需要姓名、背景、来访目的等。我们开始吧？”

original:
Today, London lies between the stars. Her new empire unfolds across the heavens.

But ten years ago – before the northern gate was opened; before the Renewed Empress led her people into the skies – it lay in a vast cavern far beneath the Earth. Deep. Dark. Marvellous.

Who were you, then?
translation:
如今，伦敦坐落于群星之间，新帝国向天际铺展。

可十年前，北境之门尚未开启，新生的女皇也未率子民升上天穹。彼时，伦敦仍位于一座广袤洞窟之中。地底幽深，黑暗，奇绝无比。

当时，你是何许人也？

original: This will determine what people call your captain, but your captain's gender is up to you.
translation: 这将决定其他人如何称呼你的车长，但车长的性别由你决定。

original: Even the stars have secrets. But they won't keep them from you. A message from an old friend begins an unwise quest to learn a secret that the stars hide. What drives you? Curiosity? Justice? Insolence? Whatever it is, it will be tested. Be warned: this is a demanding ambition, best played by a lineage that has already completed Wealth or Fame.
translation: 即便是群星，也有自己的秘密。可它们不会向你隐瞒。 一位旧识来信，引你踏上旅途。这是场鲁莽的冒险，只为揭开群星掩藏的秘密。是什么驱使你踏上征途？好奇？正义？还是狂妄？无论是哪种，都将在冒险途中经受考验。 请注意：这个野心相当困难，建议在完成财富或名声故事线后游玩。

original: You will immortalise your exploits in the Song of the Sky. For centuries, people have launched themselves into the unknown in the hope of making a name for themselves. You're sure you'll succeed. After all, you never heard of anyone who didn't. Gather stories of your exploits, and write about them in New Winchester.
translation: 你将在《天野之歌》中永载自己的功绩。 几百年来，人们不断踏入未知之地，希望能够扬名立万。你确信自己会成功。毕竟，你从未听说过有谁能活着回来讲述他们的失败。 收集你的英勇事迹，并在新温彻斯特写下它们。

original: You want a comfortable retirement. And by 'comfortable', you mean 'extravagant'. Many have made their fortunes out among the stars. Many more have failed, broken and lost in the drifting night. Will you be different? To win, gather a substantial retirement fund, acquire lodgings at a hub port, and retire.
translation: 你渴望安逸的退休生活。你所说的“安逸”，意味着“奢华至极”。 在星空中发家致富的人不少，但失败、破产、迷失在漂泊的黑夜里的人更多。你会有所不同吗？ 要想获胜，你需要积攒可观的退休金，在某座中心车站购置住所，并选择退休。

original: For a time, you served at the Ministry of Public Decency, which has become Her Majesty's preferred instrument.\r\n\r\nYou will begin with high Mirrors, the skill of investigating and deducing.
translation: 你曾供职于公德部，女王陛下眼下最为倚重的机构之一。 你开局将拥有更高的镜子值，镜子是调查和推理的技巧。

original: A student of the sciences, the arts, of philosophy. \r\n\r\nYou will begin with high Mirrors, the skill of investigating and deducing.
translation: 研习科学、艺术、或哲学的学生。 你开局将拥有更高的镜子值，镜子是调查和推理的技巧。

original: Hymns and hymnals, Sundays and sermons.\r\n\r\nYou will begin with high Hearts, the skill of convincing and enduring.
translation: 圣歌和赞美诗，说道与礼拜日。 你开局将拥有更高的红心值，红心是说服和生存的技巧。

original: The pen. The ink. The blank, monstrous page. \r\n\r\nYou will begin with high Hearts, the skill of convincing and enduring.
translation: 笔尖静候，墨水将滴，狰狞白纸，待你谱写。 你开局将拥有更高的红心值，红心是说服和生存的技巧。

original: You roved the mournful, merciless waters of the Unterzee. \r\n\r\nYou will begin with high Iron, the skill of confronting and overcoming.
translation: 你曾漫游海泽那哀伤无情的水域。 你开局将拥有更高的钢铁值，钢铁是战斗和取胜的技巧。

original: Yours was not to reason why. Yours was but to do and die.\r\n\r\nYou will begin with high Iron, the skill of confronting and overcoming.
translation: 你的职责不是质疑，而是服从与赴死。 你开局将拥有更高的钢铁值，钢铁是战斗和取胜的技巧。

original: The world is broken. One way for the rich, another for the poor. You decided to do something about it.\r\n\r\nYou will begin with high Veils, the skill of evading and deceiving.
translation: 这世界害了病。富人走阳关道，穷人走独木桥。你决定为此做点什么。 你开局将拥有更高的面纱值，面纱是隐蔽和欺骗的技巧。

original: No parents! No laws! No Masters! But also no roof over your head, no money, and often no dinner. Freedom comes at a price. \r\n\r\nYou will begin with high Veils, the skill of evading and deceiving.
translation: 无父无母！无视律法！无惧领主！但也无遮无蔽，身无分文，还经常无以果腹。自由，是有代价的。 你将以更高的面纱值开始，面纱是隐蔽和欺骗的技巧。

original:
You were a street urchin.

You raced, barefoot, across the chimneyed rooftops. You stole wigs, wallets, and purses. You made offerings to forgotten gods. 

The urchins of Old London organise into gangs. 

Which did you belong to?
translation:
你曾流落街头。

你曾在屋顶上、烟囱间赤脚奔跑。你曾偷走假发、钱夹和皮包。你曾供奉被遗忘的神灵。

旧伦敦的流浪儿们拉帮结派。

你来自哪一个帮派？

original: The most militaristic of the gangs, in their blue jackets and bright buttons. You attained the rank of corporal.\r\n \r\nIncreases your Iron, the skill of confronting and overcoming, and affiliates you with Villainy.
translation: 纪律最为森严的帮派，成员个个身穿蓝夹克，亮闪闪的纽扣一字排开。你在其中官至下士。 增加你的钢铁值，钢铁是战斗和取胜的技巧，并让你与恶棍相联系。

original: Every Fisher-King bears an old wound. Every Fisher-King talks to the wind. Every Fisher-King knows things they should not know. \r\n\r\nIncreases your Mirrors, the skill of deducing and observing, and affiliates you with Villainy.
translation: 每位渔人王都身负旧伤。每位渔人王都掌握风语。每位渔人王都知晓不该知晓之事。 增加你的镜子值，镜子是调查和推理的技巧，并让你与恶棍相联系。

original: A close-knit band that occupied a haunted rookery in the worst part of the city. \r\n\r\nIncreases your Hearts, the skill of convincing and enduring, and affiliates you with Villainy.
translation: 一帮团结紧密的同伴，盘踞在城中最破败、闹鬼传闻最盛的鸽棚旧区。 增加你的红心值、红心是说服和生存的技巧，并让你与恶棍相联系。

original:
You were a soldier.

You served in Her Majesty's military. 

But how, exactly?
translation:
你曾是士兵。

效力于女皇陛下的军队。

不过，你是如何效力的？

original: An army marches on its stomach. You had to find supplies by whatever means necessary.\r\n\r\nIncreases your Veils, the skill of deceiving and evading, and affiliates you with Villainy.
translation: 军队是铁，粮食是钢。你得不择手段地搜寻补给。 增加你的面纱值，面纱是隐蔽和欺骗的技巧，并让你与恶棍相联系。

original: You were a sapper, a mechanic, an architect, an inventor – all while shells fell and bullets flew.\r\n\r\nIncreases your Mirrors, the skill of investigating and deducing, and affiliates you with Establishment.
translation: 你曾是工程兵，兼机械师，兼建筑师，兼发明家——身处枪林弹雨，你自沉迷发明。 增加你的镜子值，镜子是调查和推理的技巧，并使你与权贵相联系。

original: In the Corps of Royal Engineers

You served in the Blues, conducting labyrinthine ceremonial duties and defending Her Majesty's person.\r\n\r\nIncreases your Hearts, the skill of convincing and enduring, and affiliates you with Bohemia.
translation: 你曾在蓝色军团服役，执行无比繁琐的仪仗任务，还负责保卫女王陛下的人身安全。 增加你的红心值，红心是说服和生存的技巧，并使你与波西米亚派艺术家相联系。

original:
You were a poet.

Poetry was popular in Old London. Some poets sought fame, others art. Some simply enjoyed Bohemian company.  

Three pre-eminent artistic movements have come to prominence. 

Which are your works most associated with?
translation:
你曾是诗人。

诗歌在旧伦敦风靡一时。有人追求名声，有人追求艺术，也有人只是醉心于波西米亚式的放浪生活。

如今，三场声势浩大的艺术运动正崭露头角。

你的作品，与哪一派最为相契？？

original: A new tradition, born in the Empress' Court. Their works are patriotic, bombastic, and occupied with the iconography of time: clocks and seasons and sand and so forth. \r\n\r\nIncreases your Iron, the skill of confronting and overcoming, and affiliates you with Bohemia.
translation: 女皇的宫廷里诞生了一种新兴流派。其作品洋溢着爱国热情，气势磅礴，且满是与时间相关的意象：时钟、四季、流沙，诸如此类。 增加你的钢铁值，钢铁是战斗和取胜的技巧，并使你与波西米亚派艺术家相联系。

original: A radical, outlawed school that delights in freedoms found in the dark. \r\n\r\nIncreases your Veils, the skill of deceiving and evading, and affiliates you with Bohemia.
translation: 一个激进的非法学派，藏于暗处，尽享自由。 增加你的面纱值，面纱是隐蔽和欺骗的技巧，并使你与波西米亚派艺术家相联系。

original: In Old London, they wrote nostalgically of the Surface and the Sun. Now, they write of the Stars, and the Treasures of Heaven. \r\n\r\nIncreases your Mirrors, the skill of investigating and deducing, and affiliates you with Bohemia.
translation: 在旧伦敦，他们追怀地表和太阳。现如今，他们关注群星和天野的宝藏。 增加你的镜子值，镜子是调查和推理的技巧，并使你与波西米亚派艺术家相联系。

original:
You were an academic.

Perhaps you were educated at one of the esteemed colleges of Benthic or Somerset. 

Perhaps you taught yourself, through trial and error and grit. 

But what was your field of study?
translation:
你曾是学者。

或许你曾就读于著名的本瑟或萨默塞特大学。

又或许你靠着反复试验、自我摸索和坚韧意志，自学成才。

那么，你专攻的学科是？

original: Once the most indulgent of studies, now the most seditious. The Ministry of Public Decency has gutted the libraries.\r\n\r\nIncreases your Veils, the skill of deceiving and evading, and affiliates you with Academe.
translation: 这曾是最广博的一门学科，现在则最为激进。为此，公德部已将图书馆洗劫一空。 增加你的面纱值，面纱是隐蔽和欺骗的技巧，并使你与学术界相联系。

original: They call it the Correspondence, the oldest of alphabets. It is maddening, revelatory, and occasionally inflammatory.\r\n\r\nIncreases your Hearts, the skill of convincing and enduring, and affiliates you with Academe.
translation: 此物名为信符，是最古老的字符语言，使人疯狂，赐人启迪，有时还会令人燃烧。 增加你的红心值，红心是说服和生存的技巧，并使你与学术界相联系。

original: Engineering. Chemistry. Anatomy. Everything you need to break something apart and put it back together again.\r\n\r\nIncreases your Iron, the skill of confronting and overcoming, and affiliates you with Academe.
translation: 你懂得拆解与拼装所需的一切知识。工程学、化学、甚至解剖学都不在话下。 增加你的钢铁值，钢铁是战斗和取胜的技巧，并使你与学术界相联系。

original:
You were a priest.

You preached the word, and brought the needs of the world before the Church in intercession. 

But besides God Almighty, to whom did you answer?
translation:
你曾是牧师。

传布真道，代芸芸众生向教会祈祷。

但除全能的上帝之外，你还效忠于谁？

original: Sisyphus had it easy. He never had to contend with Mrs Quigg.\r\n\r\nIncreases your Iron, the skill of confronting and overcoming, and affiliates you with Bohemia.
translation: 西西弗斯多轻松啊，起码不用和奎格太太打交道。 增加你的钢铁值，钢铁是战斗和取胜的技巧，并使你与波西米亚派艺术家相联系。

original: It was illegal to hunt or harass devils. They were citizens of London, like you. But the Bishop did not care.\r\n\r\nIncreases your Veils, the skill of deceiving and evading, and affiliates you with Villainy.
translation: 猎杀或骚扰魔鬼是违法行为，因为他们和你一样，也是伦敦公民。但这位主教可不管这些。 增加你的面纱值，面纱是隐蔽和欺骗的技巧，并使你与恶棍相联系。

original: The New Sequence was a young creed, then. Now it has spread to the highest offices of the Church, with Her Majesty's blessing.\r\n\r\nIncreases your Mirrors, the skill of investigating and deducing, and affiliates you with Establishment.
translation: 新秩序教义当年尚且稚嫩，如今却已传入国教最高阶层，蒙得女王钦赐祝福。 增加你的镜子值，镜子是调查和推理的技巧，并使你与权贵相联系。

original:
You were a zee-captain.

You remember bats winging across the still, black sea. The distant lights of London, calling you home. Salty prayers offered to heedless gods. 

It was a hard life, and often a short one, but you made your mark. 

What were you known for?
translation:
你曾是海泽船长。

仍记得那死寂的黑海上，成群蝙蝠振翅掠过；远方的伦敦灯火遥遥唤你归航；还有那献给冷漠诸神的粗俗祷词。

那是一段艰难的生涯，走上这条道路的人往往早逝，但你已经成就了自己的功名。

你究竟是因何闻名？

original: You were a merchant. A precarious life, lived on the knife-edge between fortune and ruin.\r\n\r\nIncreases your Mirrors, the skill of investigating and deducing, and affiliates you with Bohemia.
translation: 你是个商人，在刀尖上起舞，暴富与破产只在一念之间。 增加你的镜子值，镜子是调查和推理的技巧，并使你与波西米亚派艺术家相联系。

original: Yours were far, lonely journeys. You endured nameless hardships. You rallied your crew in the face of utmost uncertainty.\r\n\r\nIncreases your Hearts, the skill of convincing and enduring, and affiliates you with Academe.
translation: 航程漫长而孤寂，你承受着难以言说的困苦，却在面对完全的未知时召集船员，坚定前行。 增加你的红心值，红心是说服和生存的技巧，并使你与学者相联系。

original: Her Majesty's navy had a great many opinions on what should and shouldn't be sold in her territories. Your own opinions were rather different.\r\n\r\nIncreases your Veils, the skill of deceiving and evading, and affiliates you with Villainy.
translation: 女王陛下的海军总有一长串清单，规定哪些物品可以在帝国领地中流通，哪些则不可以。而你对这些事的看法，可不太一样。 增加你的面纱值，面纱是隐蔽和欺骗的技巧，并使你与恶棍相联系。

original:
You were an Auditor.

The Ministry is responsible for the promotion and preservation of British culture. 

It is a sprawling, many-branched institution. 

To which department were you appointed?
translation:
你曾是审查员。

公德部负责宣扬和传承不列颠文化。

该部门机构庞杂、分支繁多。

你曾在哪个部门任职？

original: Why censor when you can correct? A revised word here; an omitted sentence there. Now the whole page says something different; something less troublesome.\r\n\r\nIncreases your Iron, the skill of confronting and overcoming, and affiliates you with Establishment.
translation: 若修改即可，则何必审查？这里改句话，那里删段话，整页的意思立刻大不同，和谐多了。 增加你的钢铁值，钢铁是战斗和取胜的技巧，并使你与权贵相联系。

original: Their task is to determine what constitutes 'Britishness', and identify threats to it.\r\n\r\nIncreases your Hearts, the skill of convincing and enduring, and affiliates you with Establishment.
translation: 他们的任务，是定义何谓“不列颠性”，并识别一切威胁。 增加你的红心值，红心是说服和生存的技巧，并使你与权贵相联系。

original: The Office ingests raw information before it can reach vulnerable citizens, then regurgitates it in terms they should find less distressing.\r\n\r\nIncreases your Veils, the skill of deceiving and evading, and affiliates you with Establishment.
translation: 为避免心理脆弱的普通公民直接接触一手信息，审查部门会先加工原始信息，然后产出言辞更温和的二手信息。 增加你的面纱值，面纱是隐蔽和欺骗的技巧，并使你与权贵相联系。

original:
You were a revolutionary.

The law offered you no protection. 

The engines of the state were set against that which you knew to be just. 

So how did you resist?
translation:
你曾是革命家。

法律未曾予你庇护。

国家机器与你眼中的正义为敌。

那么，你是如何奋起反抗的？

original: Art travels swiftly. It cannot be imprisoned. It cannot be hanged.\r\n\r\nIncreases your Hearts, the skill of convincing and enduring, and affiliates you with Bohemia.
translation: 艺术不胫而走，困不住，绞不死。 增加你的红心值，红心是说服和生存的技巧，并使你从属于波西米亚派艺术家。

original: Lies are the tools of tyrants. You published research to expose those lies, and illuminate injustice.\r\n\r\nIncreases your Mirrors, the skill of investigating and deducing, and affiliates you with Academe.
translation: 谎言是暴君的工具。你发表研究，戳穿那些谎言，照亮世间的不公。 增加你的镜子值，镜子是调查和推理的技巧，并使你与学者相联系。

original: You marched. And when marching wasn't enough, you fought.\r\n\r\nIncreases your Iron, the skill of confronting and overcoming, and affiliates you with Villainy.
translation: 你曾走上街头。游行无效时，你便举起拳头，奋起抗争。 增加你的钢铁值，钢铁是战斗和取胜的技巧，并使你与恶棍相联系。

original: With your feet and your fists
Choose an ambition.\n\nWhat does winning mean to you?
translation:
选择一个野心。

胜利对你意味着什么？

original: Many have made their fortunes out among the stars. Many more have failed, broken and lost in the drifting night. Will you be different?\r\n\r\nTo win, gather a substantial retirement fund, acquire lodgings at a hub port, and retire.
translation: 在星空中发家致富的人不少，但失败、破产、迷失在漂泊的黑夜里的人更多。你会有所不同吗？ 要想获胜，你需要积攒可观的退休金，在某座中心车站购置住所，并选择退休。

original: You ran souls and sunlight to Gaider's Mourn and the Isle of Cats. You sailed, lampless, through the concealing dark. You lurked in hidden coves while the excisemen passed by.
translation: 你曾将灵魂与阳光走私至加德的哀悼与猫岛。你熄灭船灯，在黑暗中航行，行踪隐秘。你藏匿在隐秘的海湾，任由执法者从附近驶过。

original:
You remember bats winging across the still, black sea. The distant lights of London, calling you home. Salty prayers offered to heedless gods. 

It was a hard life, and often a short one, but you made your mark. 

What were you known for?
translation:
仍记得那死寂的黑海上，成群蝙蝠振翅掠过；远方的伦敦灯火遥遥唤你归航；还有那献给冷漠诸神的粗俗祷词。

那是一段艰难的生涯，走上这条道路的人往往早逝，但你已经成就了自己的功名。

你究竟是因何闻名？

original: The more Crew you have, the more Supplies you consume.
translation: 你拥有的列车员越多，物资消耗就越快。

original: Your hull is a little worse for wear. Try to repair it soon. You can do this for a small fee at New Winchester and certain other ports, or, sometimes, by salvaging from the wrecks of your opponents.
translation: 你的车体已经破损，请尽快修复。你可在新温彻斯特或其他特定车站低价维修；有时，也可从敌人的残骸中搜刮修复材料。

original: Your scout has discovered something! To see what it is, open your chart.
translation: 你的侦察兽发现了一些东西！如需查看，请打开地图。
你现在拥有 {{A}} x 金镑
你失去了 {{A}} x 金镑 (现在共有{{B}}).
你获得了 {{A}} x 车体 (现在共有{{B}}).
你现在拥有 {{A}} x 补给

original: You now have {{A}} x Diffident Bat
translation: 你现在拥有 {{A}} x 自卑蝠

original: You now have {{A}} x Cotterell & Hathersage 'Jerusalem'
translation: 你现在拥有 {{A}} x 卡特洛尔 & 哈瑟萨奇 '耶路撒冷'型火炮
你失去了 {{A}} x 列车员 (现在共有{{B}}).

original: Discovering a new port for the first time will reduce your Terror.
translation: 首次发现新车站将降低恐惧。
你获得了 {{A}} x 恐惧 (现在共有{{B}}).
你获得了 {{A}} x 补给 (现在共有{{B}}).
你失去了 {{A}} x 车体 (现在共有{{B}}).

original: {{A}} crates in hold. \n{{B}}% remaining in current crate.
translation:
货舱中剩余{{A}}箱。 
这一箱中还剩{{B}}%。

original: On long journeys, activate your locomotive's cruise control.
translation: 在长途旅行中，可以启动机车的巡航控制，自动前进。

original: A wreck drifts here, less fortunate even than you. "We should scavenge her for repairs," a crewman suggests.
translation: 一段机车残骸正在附近飘荡，它的运气甚至比你们还要不济。“我们应该从她身上拆点修理材料下来。”一名列车员发表了建议。

original: As First Officer, the crew look to you. The nearest station is New Winchester. Can you get the Orphean there safely?
translation: 你是大副，因此一众列车员都望向你。最近的站点是新温彻斯特，你能否率领 俄耳甫斯号 安全抵达？

original: You have returned to the Reach: an untamed, sunless span of the heavens. London's new frontier. A celestial garden run wild.
translation: 你回到了外野，这里是不羁之地、无光之空，这里是帝国的新边疆，这里是野蛮生长的天界花园。

original: Your journey back from the Blue Kingdom was tumultuous. Your locomotive is damaged, and Captain Whitlock badly wounded.
translation: 你们自蓝色王国归来，一路历经艰险，机车严重受损，惠特洛克车长也受了重伤。

original: Press        to send out your scout\n(costs Supplies)
translation:
按        派出侦察兽
(需消耗补给)

original: Before you leave New Winchester, it may be prudent to buy more Supplies. You can buy them at the Victoria Market. To visit the market, select it from the menu that appears to the left of the main panel. Here, you can swap between Shops and Stories.
translation: 为慎重起见，在离开新温彻斯特前，建议补充更多物资。你可前往维多利亚市场购买。要进入市场，请在主界面左侧的菜单中选择相应选项。在此，你可以在商店与剧情页面之间切换。

original: In addition to your ordinary crew, you now have an officer, or perhaps a mascot. Officers must be appointed before you can benefit from their skills, abilities, or animal charisma. The first officer you recruit for each role will automatically be appointed. To change officers, open the Officers panel while in port.
translation: 除常规车组成员外，你现在还拥有一位车务官，或一只吉祥物。在任命前，你无法从他们的技能、本领，或动物魅力中获得加成。每个职位的第一位车务官将被自动任命。要更换车务官，请在停靠车站时打开车务官面板。
你获得了{{A}} x 金镑（现在有{{B}}）。

original: An occurrence! Your 'Crew' Quality is now {{A}}!
translation: 一次机遇！你的 "列车员" 特性现在是 {{A}}!

original: You now have {{A}} x Cryptic Benefactor
translation: 你现在拥有 {{A}} x 隐秘的人脉

original: More advanced engines enable Full Steam Mode, allowing you to go faster at an extra cost in fuel.
translation: 更高级的发动机可以启用全速模式，以更多燃料消耗换取更高速度。

original: The sun of Eleutheria has turned against its peers and plunged its domains into lawless night.
translation: 厄琉忒里亚的太阳背叛了同胞，将自己的疆域拖入无序的永夜。

original: Look out for Horrors, which cause Terror to rise more quickly, and Wonders, which reduce it.
translation: 小心会使恐惧加速升高的怖景，留心会降低恐惧的奇观。

original: Experience gained from discovering landmarks is passed on to all your future captains.
translation: 通过发现地标获得的经验会传承给该世系的所有车长。
你获得了{{A}} x 燃料（现在共有{{B}}）。

original: Enemies that ram can be persuaded to crash into terrain, or even other enemies.
translation: 可通过巧妙引导，让冲撞型敌人撞向地形障碍，甚至撞上其他敌人。

original: An occurrence! Your 'Hull' Quality is now {{A}}!
translation: 一次机遇! 你的 "车体" 特性现在是{{A}}!
你有{{A}}金镑，因而解锁了此项 (你需要{{B}})
你需要一个 不可思议的标本
你需要一个 野蛮的秘密

original: r:Press a key to assign it to ([A-Z][a-z]*) ([A-Z][a-z]*). Modifier keys may also be used. To assign a modifier key alone, hold it down for {{A}} second.
translation: 请按下要分配的按键，修饰键也可以使用。要单独指定一个修饰键，请按住该键{{A}}秒。

original: sr:^(?<key>[\w]) is already in use. Do you want to replace it? You may also choose to add the assignment anyway.
translation: ${<key>}已被使用。是否要选择其他按键？你也可以选择强行添加这一按键。
加速 <sprite name\="key_w">    返回 <sprite name\="key_esc">
